GR13svact_pu:7356: melakaṃ caiva saṅghātaḥ putraḥ soddyotakaḥ smṛtaḥ // SvaT_15.17 //
GR13svact_pu:7357: duhitā hlādikā jñeyā kṣubdhaṃ vai calitaṃ viduḥ /
GR13svact_pu:7358: dūṣako jāra ityuktaḥ pītaṃ vanditameva ca // SvaT_15.18 //
GR13svact_pu:7360: dūṣitaṃ karṣitaṃ jñeyaṃ sammataṃ samayaṃ viduḥ // SvaT_15.19 //
GR13svact_pu:7362: vinayo dehakarma syāt sādhanaṃ tu japaḥ smṛtaḥ // SvaT_15.20 //
GR13svact_pu:7365: vimalaḥ śiṣya ityukta icchā cājñā prakīrtitā /
GR13svact_pu:7366: devatādarśanaṃ yattat labdhaṃ śastrahataṃ viduḥ // SvaT_15.22 //
GR13svact_pu:7368: ānītaṃ sāritaṃ jñeyaṃ rakṣitaṃ pihitaṃ tathā // SvaT_15.23 //
GR13svact_pu:7369: śikhāṃ saṃspṛśate yā tu sā tu śaktiṃ vinirdiśet /
GR13svact_pu:7370: śiraḥ pradarśayedyā tu sā ca binduṃ vinirdiśet // SvaT_15.24 //
GR13svact_pu:7371: lalāṭaṃ darśayedyā tu īśvaraṃ sā vinirdiśet /
GR13svact_pu:7372: tālukaṃ darśayedyā tu tayā rudraḥ prakīrtitaḥ // SvaT_15.25 //
GR13svact_pu:7373: jihvāṃ pradarśayedyā tu vidyāṃ sātha vinirdiśet /
GR13svact_pu:7374: sapta koṭayastu mantrāṇāṃ tasyā jñeyāstu suvrate // SvaT_15.26 //
GR13svact_pu:7376: kaṇṭhaṃ tu saṃspṛśeyā sā kālatattvaṃ vinirdiśet // SvaT_15.27 //
GR13svact_pu:7377: hṛtpadmaṃ darśayedyā tu puruṣaṃ sā vinirdiśet /
GR13svact_pu:7378: nābhiṃ pradarśayedyā tu prakṛtiṃ sā vinirdiśet // SvaT_15.28 //
GR13svact_pu:7382: ūrukau darśayeddevi pavanaṃ sā vinirdiśet // SvaT_15.30 //
GR13svact_pu:7383: jānunī darśayedyā tu tayā tejaḥ prakīrtitam /
GR13svact_pu:7384: jaṅghe pradarśayedyā tu varuṇaṃ sā vinirdiśet // SvaT_15.31 //
GR13svact_pu:7390: girirājasya deveśi yaṃ gatvā phalamaśnute // SvaT_15.34 //
GR13svact_pu:7394: evaṃ saṃkṣepataḥ proktaṃ melakaṃ tu varānane // SvaT_15.36 //
GR13svact_pu:7397: tasmād dhyānārcane homaṃ japam ca varavarṇini /
GR13svact_pu:7398: kurvanti bhāvitātmānas tataḥ siddhyanti mantriṇaḥ // SvaT_15.38 //
